participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Confident and laid-back, Jake approaches life with a chill attitude, always ready to take on the next skateboarding challenge.
participant_1.background: I'm a skateboarder. I am always wearing a hat. My favourite skater is Rob Dryden. My friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and ambitious, Liam enjoys socializing and has a passion for cars, often spending his free time at the gym to connect with others.
participant_2.background: I go to the gym most days just to socialize. I like to spend my money on cars. I've never had a steady relationship. I work from home.
